attributes.action: Acknowledge the rural disadvantaged areas with regards to transport!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The hot topic of 'Climate Change'...yes something needs to be done! Possibilitys or solutions, increase road tax and/or decrease the price of environmentally friendly cars.

While government has aknowledged climate and has proposed soultions more needs to be done to improve the standard and access to public transport especially in disadvantaged rural areas. Many people in this category have poor or no access to transport services or cannot afford to live in the city or areas with good transport links. 

My aim is to promote and for the prime minister to acknowledge the disadvantage rural areas with regards to transport and car tax.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
